annotations:
DENSAY
Shipping and Trading DMCC
chartering@densaydubai.com
// ERCAN
GOOD DAY
HOME  TONNAGE  OPEN   AT   GHENT    O/A     08 / 13   SEPT  AGW WP
MV SSI PROVIDENCE
37,899 DWT ON 10.54 M
BLT OCTOBER 2020, IMABARI SHIPBUILDING, JAPAN
GRT 23,232 / NRT 12,101
LOA 180 M / BEAM 29.80 M / TPC 48.60
GRAIN 46,950 CBM / BALE 45,200 CBM
5 HO / 5 HA
CR 4X30 MT – 4x24 MTS WHEN GRABS ATTACHED
NON-GRABBER
A60 BULKHEAD / CO2 FITTED / BOXY
SPEED / CONSUMPTION:
BALLAST: ABT 14.00 KTS ON ABT 16.50 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.1 MT LSMGO
LADEN: ABT 13.50 KTS ON ABT 19.50 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.1 MT LSMGO
PORT IDLE: ABT 2.0 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.1 MT LSMGO
PORT WORKING: ABT 4,5 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.1 MT LSMGO
ECO SPEED WOG
BALLAST: ABT 12.50 KNOTS ON ABT 14 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.1 MT LSMGO
LADEN: ABT 12.00 KNOTS ON ABT 14 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.1 MT LSMGO
SPEED/CONSUMPTION BASED ON GOOD WEATHER CONDITION UPTO BEAUFORT SCALE 4 (MAX 16 KTS) AND/OR DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (COMBINED SEA/SWELL/ MAXIMUM SIGNIFICANT WAVE HEIGHT OF 1.25 M) AND SMOOTH SEA, NO ADVERSE CURRENT AND/OR NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL, AND ALWAYS LOADED LESS THAN VESSEL'S MAX SUMMER LOADLINE, EVEN KEEL CONDITION AND ALWAYS EXCLUDING VOYAGES LESS THAN 48 HOURS TRANSIT TIME FROM SEA PILOT TO SEA PILOT, PASSAGES WITH RESTRICTED VISIBILITY, CONGESTED WATERS, STRAITS, NARROWED WATERS AND WHILE MANEUVERING, ENTERING/LEAVING PORTS.
IN CASE OF HOT/COLD CLIMATES AN ADDITIONAL 1MT DAILY CONSUMPTION IS EXPECTED FOR MACHINERY COOLING, AND FUEL HEATING DEMANDS. IF SEA WATER TEMPERATURE IS BELOW 15 DEGREE CELCIUS THERE WILL BE EXTRA BOILER CONSUMPTION.
PERIODS OF LESS THAN 24 HOURS, FROM NOON REPORT TO NOON REPORT, OF CONTINUOUS GOOD WEATHER TO BE EXPRESSLY EXCLUDED FROM DETERMINATION OF THE VESSEL'S PERFORMANCE. UNLESS OTHERWISE AGREED BY OWNERS, CHARTERERS MAY NOT DEDUCT OR SET-OFF AMOUNTS FROM HIRE PAYMENTS FOR SPEED AND/OR OVERCONSUMPTION CLAIMS.
VESSEL HAS LIBERTY TO CONSUME DIESEL OIL WHEN MANEUVERING, IN/OUT PORTS, STARTING OF A/E, IN THE BOLIER DURING PORT STAY, BURNING OF SLUDGE OIL IN INCINERATOR, NAVIGATING IN SHALLOW/RESTRICTED/BUSY/CONGESTED WATERS/CANALS/RIVERS/DURING PILOTAGE OR FOR SAFETY OF VESSEL DURING BAD WEATHER/FOG, ALWAYS UNDER DISCRETION OF THE MASTER
WEATHER ROUTING COMPANY CALCULATION FOR GOOD WEATHER DAYS SHALL BE ONLY APPLICABLE AND LIMITED FOR THE GOOD WEATHER DAYS ONLY AND CANNOT BE SPREAD ALL OVER THE ENTIRE VOYAGE.
BUNKERING AT OPL NOT ALLOWED
DURING CURRENCY OF THE CHARTER, BUNKERS  TO BE SUPPLIED SHALL BE IN ACCORDANCE WITH MIN ISO 8217:2017 SPECIFICATION OR ANY SUBSEQUENT AMENDMENTS THERETO.
-VLSFO 380 CST: RMG 380 AS PER ISO 8217:2017-E (MAX SULPHUR CONTENT: 0.5% PCT)
-LSMGO: DMA ISO 8217:2017-E (MAX SULPHUR CONTENT : 0.1% )
BOTH GRADES ALWAYS TO COMPLY WITH MARPOL 73/78 REQUIREMENTS, REG 14, 18 OF ANNEX VI AND ANY SUBSEQUENT AMENDMENTS THERETO.
DURING THE CURRENCY OF THIS CHARTER, CHARTERERS ARE ONLY PERMITTED TO SUPPLY ABOVE GRADES TO THE VESSEL.
VESSEL CAN ONLY BE BUNKERED UP TO 85 PCT OF TANK CAPACITY. COMINGLING OF DIFFERENT BUNKER STEMS NOT ALLOWED.
ALL DETAILS ARE ABOUT
Best Regards,
Ercan Kibar
Shipowning Division
Mob: +90 506 980 28 11
Skype: ercankibar@gmail.com
